h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: When you reach the inner hamlet, you will come across a Spearbone on the bridge. Defeating it will give you a Mind Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 9'.
The content is as follows:
When you reach the inner hamlet, you will come across a Spearbone on the bridge. Defeating it will give you a Mind Core.
